Double strike, lifelink, prominence [i](Whenever exactly two creatures you control attack, those creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn.)[/i]
Whenever Nalta and Lia attack with exactly one other creature, create a 1/1 white Horse Spirit creature token with prominence at end of combat. [i](Whenever exactly two creatures you control attack, those creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn.)[/i]
